sentences.english: The campus boasts elegant environment with green plants and fragrant flowers, which is excellent for learning and living.
sentences.chinese: 校园环境幽雅，绿树成荫，鸟语花香，宜学宜居。

sentences.english: His latest experimental short film Twitters and Fragrance is forthcoming.
sentences.chinese: 目前实验短片《鸟语花香》正在制作中。

sentences.english: Hung Chin-Mountain National Forest Park Maolin Xiuzhu, fine spring.
sentences.chinese: 洪庆山国家森林公园茂林修竹，鸟语花香。

sentences.english: In the beautiful gardens full of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 在鸟语花香的美丽花园里。

sentences.english: Let our homes to present the hill, former blue roses.
sentences.chinese: 让我们的家园再呈现昔日的碧水青山，鸟语花香。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beautiful of flowers, the song of the bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: Be able to see one in each corner of the world.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角落能看见一个鸟语花香的天地。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beauty of flowers, the song of bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: Through the short summer season, the valley is abuzz with activity.
sentences.chinese: 整个短暂的夏天里，山谷里鸟语花香，生机勃勃。

sentences.english: Quiet northern part of trees, flowers.
sentences.chinese: 北部树木幽静，鸟语花香。

sentences.english: Fishing people immersed in the flowers, there is an extraordinary feeling refined.
sentences.chinese: 钓鱼人沉浸在鸟语花香里，有一种超凡脱俗的感觉。

sentences.english: Sunshine, flowers, spring colors the earth to green.
sentences.chinese: 阳光普照，鸟语花香，春天绿了大地。

sentences.english: The green grass is the always fine spring day.
Don't tell anyone, but I'm taking a little time to smell the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 别跟任何人说，我要用点儿时间享受一下鸟语花香。

sentences.english: Pacing out, where there are neither fine springs nor my daisy.
sentences.chinese: 踱步出去，那里没有鸟语花香，没有，我的雏菊。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beauty of flowers, the song of a bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。
